name: logLevel
shortDescription: Gets or sets the current log level
description: This method gets or sets the current log level.

parameters.name: level
parameters.description:
This is the log level that you want to set. The following are valid values:
  • 0: Log nothing
  • 1: Critical
  • 2: Error
  • 3: Warning
  • 4: Info
  • 5: Debug
Do not use "debug" for normal operation because it makes Homegear perform more slowly.

returnValue: Returns the current log level as an integer
